## UnicodeUtils.neutralBidirectionalRanges variable

ASCII punctuation is considered to have neutral direction: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Basic\_Latin\_(Unicode\_block)\#Table\_of\_characters

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
neutralBidirectionalRanges: number[][]
```
